translation.en: [man] It's a brave new world, isn't it?
Within a decade, we could be reviving extinct species.
The thylacline, the woolly mammoth, saber-toothed cats.
Looks like Steven Spielberg's gonna get his park after all.
I think you've had to listen to me for long enough.
No matter what your politics are,
we know that climate change is causing glacial deterioration.
translation.ko: 기후 변화로 인한 빙하 해빙 현상은 모두가 압니다

translation.en: We also know that there are viruses and bacterias

translation.ko: 바이러스와 박테리아가 갇혀 있다는 것도 알죠

translation.en: a prehistoric equivalent of the Zika virus,
translation.ko: 선사 시대 버전 지카 바이러스가 있다면 어떨까요?

translation.en: were to appear as a result of the melt.
translation.ko: 빙하 속 바이러스가 되살아날지도 모를 일입니다

translation.en: Our bodies would have no immunity.
And we would have no vaccines that could help us.
translation.ko: 병을 막을 백신도 없습니다 "전염병을 논하는 세계 지도자 회의"

translation.en: I don't think it's going to be asteroids or nuclear war that wipes us out.
translation.ko: 소행성 충돌이나 핵전쟁으로 지구 종말이 오진 않을 거라고요

translation.en: Ancient forms of these pathogens could start a pandemic
translation.ko: 원초적 형태의 병원체가 범유행 전염병을 일으키면

translation.en: that makes the bubonic plague look like-- like a chicken pox party.
This isn't nature crying out for help.
translation.ko: 이것은 도움을 구하는 자연의 울부짖음이 아닙니다

translation.en: And that is why I'm calling on you,
to come together and pool your resources and knowledge to get ahead of this.
translation.ko: 각자의 자원과 지식을 동원해 이 문제를 극복해 나가야 합니다

translation.en: And the data tells us that this is inevitable.
Listening to you talk about mass extinction really gets me goin'.
translation.ko: 집단 멸종 얘기를 들으니까 정말 흥분되네요

translation.en: Um... I'm sorry. I'm a... married man.
I apologize for the interruption, Dr. Swann.
Dr. Lansing is a colleague -from the Arctic Science Exchange. -Oh.
translation.ko: 랜싱 박사님은 북극 과학 교류 때 뵌 동료셔

translation.en: It's probably terrible timing, but, um...
we lost contact with Dr. Vercernis
at the Arctic Research Station three days ago.
translation.ko: 북극 연구 기지의 버커니스 박사와 사흘 전부터 연락이 끊겼네

translation.en: Oh, well, the weather regularly knocks out communications there.
-I'm... I'm sure he's okay. -Yes, you're probably right.
The thing is, last we heard from him,
he'd found something, and he was pretty excited.
translation.ko: 박사는 뭔가를 발견하고 무척 흥분한 상태였어

translation.en: He wanted to talk to you about it.
Needless to say, we're all anxious to get some updates.
translation.ko: 예상하겠지만 다들 새 소식을 기다리고 있네

translation.en: -Well, I can't. I mean-- -It... It's fine.
We can celebrate our anniversary any time.
-♪ Watch it burn, watch it burn ♪ -[phone rings]
Okay, good, good. Yeah, I need your help. How fast can you get here?
translation.ko: - 무슨 일 있어? - 잘됐다 응, 나 좀 도와줘 얼마나 빨리 와줄 수 있어?

translation.en: Damn, Luther, you need to get a research station somewhere warmer,
translation.ko: 젠장, 루서 카리브 해안처럼 따뜻한 데로

translation.en: like the Caribbean or some shit.
You should be here in the winter!
-How many people you say live up here? -Two.
Well, there's no one here now.
Luther, take a look at this.
-What? What is it? -No, no, no, no. Step back. Step back.
Some kind of biomass. Something he found.
Let's get the hell outta here, man.
We gotta call this in, Mike.
We've transported the biomass and a skull fragment to your lab
translation.ko: 바이오매스와 두개골 조각을 자네 연구실로 보냈네

translation.en: Any results for any of the tests?
What about the mycology reports I requested?
Um... Did the search team find anything?
There's no sign of him or Ava.
[sighs] I'm sorry I got you into this, Mikey.
We are gonna be okay, right?
Yeah, we're gonna be all right, Mike.
[man on PA] Dr. Swann, your family's here.
Are you okay? When are you guys gonna be coming home?
translation.ko: 괜찮으세요? 두 분 언제쯤 나올 수 있어요?

translation.en: Well, when we start to feel better.
Have I ever let anything happen to your dad?
translation.ko: 아저씨 있으니까 아빠 걱정은 안 해도 돼

translation.en: [boy] I don't have any, Uncle Mike.
-One more and that's "jackass" for you. -Fuck you!
translation.ko: - 한 번 더 놓치면 너 꼴통 - 죽는다

translation.en: -I always used to win at this game! -Huh.
Just as shitty as the last time.
I will give you one guess about today's news.
Wait, Emil, we don't know why we're not shedding the virus yet.
translation.ko: 에밀, 바이러스가 없어진 건지 아직 확실하지도 않잖아요

translation.en: There is a huge lack of results.
Yes, there's a lack of results because no one put it on record.
translation.ko: 기록한 적이 없으니 결과랄 것도 없었지만

translation.en: It's a harmless Ice Age-era cold.
Pack your things. Go to your family.
Well, you don't have to tell me twice.
[chuckles] You heard the man, Luther. Let's get the fuck outta here.
Mrs. Swann, are you trying to seduce me?
Mrs. Swann... ahem, as a doctor,
I must advise you that any sexual contact, um...
translation.ko: 성적 접촉에는 고유의 위험이 뒤따른다는 걸

translation.en: [announcer] Police are saying little about this latest killing.
translation.ko: 최근 발생한 살인 사건에 대한 경찰 발표가 미진한 가운데

translation.en: was pronounced dead on the scene in downtown Seneca.
translation.ko: 세니커 시내의 사건 현장에서 사망 판정을 받았습니다

translation.en: Authorities acknowledge possible links to two previous deaths,
translation.ko: 경찰은 이전 2건의 사망 사건과의 연관 가능성을 인정했는데요

translation.en: whose family members are demanding police be more forthcoming
translation.ko: 톰 벤실리터스를 비롯한 피해자들의 유족들은 사건의 잔혹성을 더욱 적극적으로 알리기를

translation.en: about the brutal nature of these killings,
stating the public need to know the extent of the danger that they may be in.
translation.ko: 해당 사건의 위험성에 대해 시민들도 알아야 한다는 뜻에서죠

translation.en: Oh, Jesus, Michael. Why would you leave your door open like that?
You dropped me for another job.
translation.ko: 또 일 때문에 연락을 안 했겠다?

translation.en: Mm. Well, that's a new one.
Yeah, I wish I was lying, but it's actually true.
That's why I told you on the phone...
I'm gonna make it up to you.
You like to talk, don't you, Michael?
I said are you taking me to dinner?
Well, we gotta go. I have an open house in the morning.
translation.ko: 갈 거면 빨리 가자 아침에 집 보여주기로 했어

translation.en: [Luther] Why am I not getting anywhere with you?
If that thing talks back, I am so out of here.
translation.ko: 저게 말만 할 줄 알면 당장 때려치울 텐데 말이죠

translation.en: I thought these samples would be swimming with pathogens.
I can't even find a virus or a bacteria.
Amino fluorescence test came back negative too.
At least I'm starting to feel more like myself.
Fayne said he's never felt better.
[man on TV] Police discourage talk of a serial killer despite this latest body
translation.ko: 최근 발견된 시신과 이전 사건들에 유사성이 있다는 소문에도

translation.en: and certain rumored similarities between the crime scenes of the various victims.
translation.ko: 경찰은 연쇄 살인 발표에 소극적인 모습입니다

translation.en: At a news conference this afternoon,
Seneca Police Chief Paul MacErlane appealed to anyone
who may have any information about this latest death
translation.ko: 최근 사망 사건에 대한 사소한 정보라도 있다면

translation.en: [echoing] ...have combed through hours of surveillance video...
translation.ko: 몇 시간에 이르는 CCTV 영상을 샅샅이 뒤졌지만

translation.en: So the veggies, chips, and dip are a really great option
if you're looking for something a little bit lighter.
I'll make it up to you.
When? When will you make it up to me?
Don't bitch about this. It's my living.
This better be good, Les. You really screwed the mood around here.
translation.ko: 별거 아니기만 해요 분위기 다 망쳤단 말이에요

translation.en: Raw footage on the new kill.
[woman] What the fuck happened to her neck?
Put this up right away, Jer-gen. Top of the landing page.
translation.ko: 이거 바로 올려, 저르겐 첫 페이지 맨 위에

translation.en: I saw my guy, Dr. Mackie, last week.
Thought it was an infection, but he couldn't find anything.
Weird stuff's been happening in my head.
I was sitting here at the bar the other night.
I had two drinks, that's it.
And all of a sudden, I'm...
Maybe you were just a little...
No. I'm talking about people across the room.
translation.ko: 아니, 저 구석에서 하는 말도 다 들리더라니까

translation.en: And I could read a menu 40 feet away.
I'm not exactly sure that's possible.
No, no, if you were delusional, you would think it was real. But...
translation.ko: 아니, 진짜라고 믿어야 망상이지 근데 넌...

translation.en: But I do know there's something wrong with me.
Well, we'll... we'll run some tests, for sure.
I'm sure it's nothing to worry about.
That's what I say to you whenever there's a lot to worry about.
translation.ko: 진짜 걱정될 때 하는 소리인 거 내가 모를까 봐?

translation.en: You know this is illegal, right?
The coroner's department's paid for by taxpayer dollars.
They've no right to withhold information about a series of vicious murders.
translation.ko: 연쇄 살인이 터졌는데 정보를 숨겨서야 되겠어?

translation.en: Get me every autopsy on the killer's victims.
Not much blood left in them.
Might have something to do with being torn apart.
According to this, there was less than there should be.
None of these victims have more than two.
And the blood found at the murder scene doesn't account for what's missing.
translation.ko: 살해 현장에서 발견된 혈액도 한참 부족하고

translation.en: [assistant] So, the electron test results came back.
second batch was negative, and Fayne's sample was inconclusive.
translation.ko: 2차 표본도 음성 페인의 표본은 결과 불충분이에요

translation.en: Yeah, I know. It's time to send it offshore.
Proteins that cause really bad shit like mad cow.
Boy, you sure know how to talk to a girl.
how about we all drive over to Emilio's and get a pizza?
I thought I was going to get a much different offer.
translation.ko: 난 또 다른 거 하자는 줄 알았지

translation.en: [laughs] I haven't told you what we could do for dessert.
translation.ko: 밥 먹고 뭐 할지는 아직 말 안 했는걸

translation.en: I need your help right now.
-I don't know how it happened, man. -What are you talking about?
translation.ko: 어쩌다 그렇게 됐는지 모르겠어 무슨 소리야?

translation.en: -Michael! What the-- what the fuck? -Luther, I didn't--
translation.ko: 마이클! - 이거 뭐야? - 루서, 나 아니야

translation.en: You have to believe me! I didn't do this!
translation.ko: 제발 믿어줘, 내가 한 짓 아니야

translation.en: I didn't do this. All right? I don't know what happened!
-Who is she? -I don't know what... I don't...
-How'd you get here? What happened? -No, I mean...
translation.ko: 여긴 어떻게 왔어? 어떻게 된 거야?

translation.en: -I-- I don't know. -What do you mean you don't know, Mike?
translation.ko: - 잘 모르겠어 - 어떻게 모를 수가 있어?

translation.en: I remember I was having a beer. I'm in the bar talking to her,
translation.ko: 맥주 마신 건 기억나 바에서 저 여자랑 이야기했어

translation.en: and she asks me if I could walk her home.
-And then that-- that thing started again. -What thing?
With my-- with my senses, my hearing, my sight.
[panting] Everything went all crazy, and then...

translation.ko: 그냥 앉아 있었는데 기억이 안 나
그냥 앉아 있었는데 기억이 안 나 괜찮아, 마이크

translation.en: Sh, sh, sh. You walk her home, right?
Wait! I-- I remember us getting to her building and then...
translation.ko: 잠깐, 건물 앞에 온 건 기억나

translation.en: Luther, you know me more than anybody else.
You know that I couldn't do this.
-We gotta call the police. -No! They won't believe me.
translation.ko: - 경찰에 신고해야겠다 - 안 돼, 안 믿을 거야

translation.en: -Mike, you didn't do anything! -It's open and shut!
translation.ko: - 마이크, 아무 짓 안 했다며 - 어떻게 될지 뻔해

translation.en: I'll go to prison, and we won't know who did this.
translation.ko: 난 감옥에 갈 테고 진범은 영영 못 찾겠지

translation.en: What the fuck are you talking about?
Yeah, that's-- that's who did this shit. Some guy was threatening her.
translation.ko: 그래, 그놈 짓이야 누가 협박하고 있었다고

translation.en: That's who did this shit. I just need time to find the guy.
-I just need some time to find the guy. -No, Mike. We gotta lawyer up.
translation.ko: - 그놈을 찾아야 해 - 마이크, 변호사 부르자

translation.en: When we're ready, sure. I'll do what's right, I promise you.
I promise you, but right now, I just need some time.
-I'm calling the cops. -No, Luther! Listen to me!
translation.ko: - 경찰 부를 거야 - 아니, 루서, 잘 들어!

translation.en: -I didn't do this! You know I didn't! -Sh, sh!
translation.ko: 나 아니야, 난 아무 짓 안 했다고

translation.en: -I didn't do this! -Mike, stop. Stop, okay?
What do you have in mind?
-Uh... -Tell me. You're my best friend, right?
Can you help me clean her apartment?
It doesn't work like that, Michael.
No. Forensics are too good now. It's the 21st century.
But we could slow them down.
Right? Just to buy me some time to find the guy.
translation.ko: 안 그래? 그놈 찾을 시간만 벌어줘

translation.en: You're my only hope, man. Please.
You gotta help me. Help me get outta this.
I didn't do it. I didn't do it.
So, what the hell happened last night?
[man] It's just past the tracks up here on the right-hand side.
I have to go to the police.
But I'm telling them things that they need to know.
How could you have done this?
I owe the guy my life...
I couldn't just turn my back on him.
Uh-- I know. I-- I know.
Listen... I-- I-- Obviously, there are things I have to make right...
translation.ko: 여보, 내 손으로 바로잡아야 할 일이야

translation.en: I'll be back in a little bit, okay?
This looks good. Just sign it here.
Uh... My name is Dr. Luther Swann.
I'm a research physician at Bremerton.
Uh, a friend of mine hurt someone...
and I may have helped cover up the crime.
How bad did he hurt this person?
I think you'd better come with me.
Get your hands in the air!
You know it's obstruction. You'll go for five years, right?
translation.ko: 공무집행방해인 거 알죠? 5년은 살아야 할 겁니다

translation.en: That's why it's only five. Sit down!
I wasn't thinking about finding a lawyer. I'm here to help you find Michael Fayne.
translation.ko: 변호사는 생각도 안 했어요 마이클 페인을 찾게 도와드릴게요

translation.en: We had to shoot him to make him stop.
We talked to him two hours, and he was just fine, thanks.
translation.ko: 2시간 동안 신문했는데 아픈 기색 하나 없었소 어찌나 다행인지

translation.en: That he won't talk to us on any substantive level.
How'd they get you here so fast?
He injured four officers on the way in here.
translation.ko: 여기 오는 길에 경관 넷을 다치게 했소

translation.en: I think he was exposed to pathogens that are causing this behavior.
translation.ko: 마이클이 이러는 건 병원체에 노출됐기 때문이에요

translation.en: I can hear you, you know.
Do you see what I mean?
There's something very strange going on with this man.
translation.ko: 이 친구한테 뭔가 이상한 일이 벌어지고 있어요

translation.en: But the problem is he's not the only killer.
translation.ko: 문제는 저자 말고 살인자가 또 있다는 거요

translation.en: There's another guy, a dentist who committed suicide.
We got his DNA from crime scene three and four.
The other killer was a dentist?
Fayne saw his dentist last week.
Hey, Mike. What's the name of your dentist?
I need to get in there and talk to him. Alone.
He said he would only talk to me.
I always thought getting shot would hurt a lot more.
translation.ko: 총 맞는 거 생각보다 안 아프더라

translation.en: None of this is making sense.
I mean, the elevated sense of hearing, the sight,
That would require alterations on a cellular level.
translation.ko: 그러려면 세포 수준에서 전부 다 바뀌어야 해

translation.en: There must've been something on that biomass.
Okay, so then why is none of this shit happening to you?
I don't know that yet, Mike.
I mean, maybe it needs a-- a cofactor, I guess.
But something is causing these changes.
translation.ko: 뭔지는 몰라도 그것 때문에 이렇게 된 거야

translation.en: I did it, Luther. I killed her and the others.
translation.ko: 내가 한 짓이야, 루서 내가 그 여자랑 사람들을 죽였어

translation.en: -What? No, no, no. Not here. -I think I...
-It's like I can't control it, you know. -Not here. Mikey, stop it.
translation.ko: - 손쓸 도리가 없어 - 하지 마, 마이키, 그만해

translation.en: -It's like I'm turning into someone else. -Mikey-- In the name of God, please help me.
translation.ko: 다른 사람으로 변하는 것 같아 제발 어떻게든 좀 도와줘

translation.en: Mikey, until you get a lawyer, shut up. They're listening.
translation.ko: 변호사 올 때까지 조용히 해 밖에서 다 듣고 있어

translation.en: I don't mean help me get out of here. I mean...
translation.ko: 여기서 꺼내 달라는 거 아니야 내 말은...

translation.en: How did you say they found you?
about an hour and a half ago.
that new Rover you just bought,
translation.ko: 뽑은 지 얼마 안 된 새 로버

translation.en: And then they tased me, and I forgot it.
-Till now. -I am here for you, Michael.
translation.ko: - 이제 기억났지 - 널 위해 온 거야

translation.en: Yes. It's not just sight and sound, Luther.
I'm not afraid of you, Mike.
I don't even want cash for this. I want points.
Two serial killers, one captured, one dead, and new murder photos?
translation.ko: 연쇄 살인범이 둘이야 하나는 잡히고 하나는 죽었는데 살인 사건 사진이 또 나왔다고

translation.en: I call TMZ with that, you lose everything.
translation.ko: TMZ에 넘기면 넌 아무것도 못 건져

translation.en: I give it to you, you break the internet.
Only if I get to meet him.
He went batshit in interrogation, super violent.
They're sending him to Seneca Psych for secure care.
translation.ko: 안전하게 치료하겠다고 세니커 정신 병원으로 보냈지

translation.en: -I know the place. -I can't get you in.
translation.ko: - 어딘지 알아요 - 난 못 들여보내 줘

translation.en: and I'll send you the pics right now.
Look at these crime scene photos he just sent me of the latest victim.
I bet you all her blood is gone...
Who knows? It could be true.
We got the results of PMC testing back.
But these particular prions are unknown.
They've recovered prions from all three samples.
Biomass, ancient human skull, and a living adult male.
translation.ko: 바이오매스와 고대 인류 두개골 살아있는 성인 남성에서

translation.en: West parking lot outside the front entrance.
You're breaking into a secure unit to find a serial killer,
translation.ko: 연쇄 살인범 잡는다고 정신 병동에 들어가서는

translation.en: Somebody pulling something wouldn't stop for a coffee.
translation.ko: 몰래 침입한 사람이 커피 마실 정신이 있겠어?

translation.en: What's going on? Where the hell have you been?
It's bad news about Mike, Jess.
You mean the mad cow thing?
You had that fever too, you know.
We don't know anything yet, Jess.
But if the changes in him are caused by prions,
but if we re-medicate this guy, we could kill him.
I'd like to ask you a few questions.
You don't smell like a doctor.
I want to help you tell your side of the story, Mr. Fayne.
translation.ko: 페인 씨의 이야기를 할 수 있게 도와드릴게요

translation.en: The bullet wounds are almost completely healed,
and his hemoglobin's off the scale.
Maybe that ties into the missing blood.
All the victims have been missing a lot of blood.
Way more than we can account for at the scenes.
translation.ko: 현장에서 나온 양보다 훨씬 더 많이

translation.en: Now, if he ingested the victims' blood--
they found over a liter of blood in his stomach.
Yet he showed no signs of toxicity or dehydration.
I don't know who I am...
We need backup. All officers report.
Please tell me I got that.
-Then check it again, top to bottom. -Detective.
I have to get home to my wife and my kid.
You're not a free man, Swann.
but you don't know where Fayne is.
And he thinks I sold him out. My family is in danger.
translation.ko: 제가 자기를 넘긴 줄 알아요 우리 가족이 위험하다고요

translation.en: I'll see if I can send a patrol car.
No, no, no, no, no. Please, I need to-- to go to them.
Let me go get them, please.
You saw what he did to your officers.
Hi, it's Jess. Leave a message.
Call me when you get this. Bye.
All right, listen to me, Dez. Go home.
translation.ko: 아빠 말 잘 들어, 얼른 집에 가

translation.en: Right now. Immediately. Lock the doors.
I'll be there in just a little bit. I'll call 911, okay?
translation.ko: 아빠도 금방 갈 거다 911에 신고할게, 알았지?

translation.en: There was something following me. I swear.
